channel.title: How do I use a moparscape server?
channel.description: I've searched all over the furoms and i would like to know how to use someones server. I do not want i guide on making one (there are plenty of those) I just want to know how to use one that has been set up. I downloaded all their stuff and unzipped it, but i have no idea how to use it. Right now all i have is a bunch of computer data and no game :(. So could someone please direct to a tutorial or just explain on this thread how to use servers. (you'll have to be patience i'm completly new to this kind of thing)

item.title: How do I use a moparscape server?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

Wrong section, please go to RS2 Server Development/Help.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I use a moparscape server?
